queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:adlss_plans` ( `id` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `cycle` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, `status` char(1) NOT NULL, `createdAt` datetime NOT NULL, `updatedAt` datetime DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:adlss_subscribables` ( `id` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `planId` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL, `objectType` varchar(16) NOT NULL, `objectId` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `createdAt` datetime NOT NULL, `updatedAt` datetime DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:adlss_subscriptions` ( `id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `planId` mediumint(8) NOT NULL, `orderId` mediumint(8) NOT NULL, `itemId` varchar(12) NOT NULL, `productId` mediumint(8) NOT NULL, `companyId` mediumint(8) NOT NULL, `status` char(1) NOT NULL, `startDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `endDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `neverExpires` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `paidCycles` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `elapsedCycles` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createdAt` datetime NOT NULL, `updatedAt` datetime DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
